message: Hi Bob, let's start off fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you to accept now, as the value decreases with each round!
Hey Alice, I think a 55/45 split is more fair. I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but let's be reasonable. We can't keep losing money with each round!
Bob, my offer still stands.  A 60/40 split is generous, especially considering we're losing value fast. Let's be sensible and end this here.
Alice, let's be realistic. The money is shrinking fast.  A 50/50 split is the only fair way to go at this point.  We both get something, and we don't lose any more value.
